p: The search strategy used with the selected terms was (“postpartum women” OR “postnatal women” OR “perinatal women” OR “pregnant women”) AND (“covid-19” OR “severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2” OR “severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2” OR “2019-nCoV” OR “SARS-CoV-2” OR “2019nCoV” OR “coronavirus”) AND (parturition OR “labor, obstetric” OR “labor stage, third” OR “labor stage, fourth” OR childbirth OR delivery OR postpartum OR puerperium OR “period, postpartum”).
